text: This place is very closely located to the Maxi and Canadian tire. it's a very nice place to grab and quick bite to eat if you're ever hungry on your way to and from the grocery store. Was my first time to go there and the staff was very friendly and service was very quick! I had a very good experience there! Although it's a fairly small restaurant, there are lots of options of what kind of fast food to eat!

The staff is very pleasant. The quality of the food is amazing considering that this is a small diner.

Lunch time on weekdays it gets very busy, with students. From the nearby school mobbing the place.

Recommend you take long look at menu. Hamburgers, hotdogs and club sandwiches I can vouch for, all good and well done.

Que dire du Restaurant Chez Luma?

Les frites sont fraîchement coupées le matin et sont délicieuses.

Le spécial Luma  est toute à fait divin. Double hamburger + fromage + bacon, un vrai délice pour les papilles gustative, une frite et une boisson gazeuse. Tout ça pour la modique somme de 8$.

Le propriétaire ? Un des plus sympathique que j'ai rencontrer, trilingue (Français, anglais et espagnol), il est toujours là pour vous parler. 

Un restaurant qui en vaut grandement le détour. Je vous suggère grandement de l'essayer.
